---
name: UI / UX Issue
about: Report a visual, layout, interaction, or user experience problem
title: ""
labels: ui/ux
assignees: ""
---

**Describe the UI/UX issue**
A clear description of what you see versus what you expect to see.
Ex. The submit button overlaps the input field on mobile / The error message is unclear about what went wrong.

**Affected page or component**
Which page, route, or component is affected?
Ex. `/settings` → Save button / Navbar dropdown on scroll

**Type of issue**

- [ ] Visual / Layout (misalignment, overlap, spacing)
- [ ] Responsiveness (mobile, tablet, small screen)
- [ ] Accessibility (contrast, keyboard nav, screen reader)
- [ ] Interaction / Animation (hover, click, transition)
- [ ] Inconsistency (looks or behaves differently across pages)
- [ ] Confusing UX flow (unclear, misleading, or frustrating)
- [ ] Dark mode / theming
- [ ] Typography / Readability
- [ ] Other

**Steps to reproduce**

1. Go to '...'
2. Resize browser to '...' / Use device '...'
3. Scroll to / Click on '...'
4. See issue

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen or how it should look.

**Screenshots / Recordings**
If applicable, add screenshots or screen recordings to help illustrate the problem.
Annotated images are especially helpful.

**Severity**

- [ ] Critical — blocks usage entirely
- [ ] High — significantly degrades the experience
- [ ] Medium — noticeable but has a workaround
- [ ] Low — minor visual polish

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**

- OS: [e.g. macOS 14, Windows 11]
- Browser: [e.g. Chrome 123, Safari 17]
- Screen resolution: [e.g. 1440×900]

**Smartphone (please complete the following information):**

- Device: [e.g. iPhone 14, Samsung Galaxy S23]
- OS: [e.g. iOS 17, Android 14]
- Browser: [e.g. Safari, Chrome]

**Are you willing to contribute a fix?**

- [ ] Yes — I can open a PR
- [ ] Partially — I can help with direction but need implementation support
- [ ] No — submitting for the team

**Additional context**
Add any other context, Figma links, design references, or related issues here.
